title: Client / Internet troubles?
body:
Recently, I've been facing a lot of issues when entering a game. It might be because of the internet or the client itself (I'm not sure which), either way, I've been disconnecting during the loading stage and it's resulting in quite a few remakes. I really don't want to get banned, so how do I fix this? Is the game too heavy to run on my computer and is there any way I can prevent/fix that? What are some things I can do beforehand so I don't always cause a remake? 

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
try looking through these FAQs: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/sections/115002165887

I'm having similar issues although not as bad.

When a game starts its like LoL is sucking every ounce of power out of my PC to launch the game and I have an extremely good PC.
I don't know what they did, but its been pretty taxing for 2-3 weeks.

Also today i've had huge FPS drops and i'm not alone.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs

Either LoL is broken or maybe a graphics card update broke something with LoL.
